thoughts.text: As suspected, Node.js is not installed on the system. This is why the 'npx' command was not found. I'll need to install Node.js before I can install NextJS. However, I don't have superuser privileges, so I can't use the 'apt' command to install it. I'll need to find an alternative way to install Node.js.
thoughts.reasoning: Node.js is a prerequisite for NextJS. Without it, I can't proceed with the frontend development of the app.
thoughts.plan:
- Find a way to install Node.js
- Install Node.js
- Install NextJS
- Develop the frontend of the app
- Install other necessary libraries
- Start developing the rest of the app
thoughts.criticism: I should have checked if Node.js was already installed before attempting to install NextJS. This would have saved time and avoided the error.
thoughts.speak: I'm going to find an alternative way to install Node.js.
